All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AboutController
AboutController is a Spring MVC controller that handles HTTP GET requests for the "/about" URL.
AdminDashboardController
Controller responsible for the administrator dashboard and system management functions.
AgmsApplication
Main application class for the Airport Gate Management System (AGMS) This class serves as the entry point for the Spring Boot application
AircraftModel
Represents an aircraft in the Airline Ground Management System (AGMS).
AircraftModel.AircraftStatus
 
AircraftType
Enum representing different types of aircraft that can be assigned to gates.
AirlineDashboardController
Controller for the airline staff dashboard functionality.
AssignmentModel
Represents a gate assignment in the Airport Gate Management System.
AssignmentService
Service class responsible for managing gate assignments for flights.
AssignmentStatus
Represents the possible states of a gate assignment.
AuthorizationCodeService
Defines the contract for authorization code validation in the AGMS system.
DashboardController
DashboardController handles routing to different dashboards based on the user's role.
FlightCssClasses
 
FlightModel
 
FlightModel.FlightStatus
 
FlightOperationsController
Controller handling all flight operations related endpoints in the AGMS system.
FlightOperationsService
Service interface defining flight operations functionality.
GateDashboardController
Controller responsible for gate-level management operations.
GateManagementService
Defines the contract for managing airport gates.
GateModel
Represents a gate in an airport with various attributes and capabilities.
GateModel.GateFeature
Gate features representing available facilities
GateModel.GateSize
Gate sizes determining aircraft compatibility
GateModel.GateType
Gate types representing the kind of flights the gate can handle
GateOperationsService
Defines the core operations for managing airport gates in the AGMS system.
GateOperationsService.GateStatus
Represents the possible states a gate can be in.
GateStatus
Defines all possible states a gate can be in within the AGMS system.
HomeController
HomeController is a Spring MVC controller that handles HTTP requests for the home and about pages.
InMemoryAssignmentService
In-memory implementation of assignment management.
InMemoryFlightOperationsService
 
InMemoryGateManagementService
An in-memory implementation of the GateManagementService interface that manages airport gates.
InMemoryGateOperationsService
Provides an in-memory implementation of gate operations management.
InMemoryUserService
Provides an in-memory implementation of the UserService interface.
LoginController
Controller for handling user login operations.
LoginModel
The LoginModel class represents the data model for user login information.
LoginService
Service responsible for handling user authentication and login operations.
MaintenanceModel
Represents a maintenance record for aircraft in the system.
MaintenanceModel.MaintenanceStatus
 
MaintenanceModel.MaintenanceType
 
MaintenanceRecord
Represents a maintenance record for aircraft maintenance tracking.
MaintenanceRecord.MaintenanceStatus
 
MaintenanceRecord.MaintenanceType
 
RegisterController
RegisterController handles the registration process for new users.
RegistrationService
Service responsible for handling user registration operations.
StaticAuthorizationCodeService
Provides a static, in-memory implementation of authorization code validation.
UserModel
Enhanced UserModel that combines practical validation with domain model relationships.
UserRole
Enum defining the different user roles in the system.
UserService
Defines the core user management operations for the AGMS system.
WebConfig
WebConfig class implements WebMvcConfigurer to configure resource handlers and view controllers.
